subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: After three days filled with crashes that left some riders nursing bloody wounds, deep bruises and even broken bones, Alessandro Petacchi of Italy won an uneventful Stage 4.
snippet: After three days filled with crashes that left some riders nursing bloody wounds, deep bruises and even broken bones, Alessandro Petacchi of Italy won an uneventful Stage 4.
